Container.Name: google-musicmanager
Container.Overview:
Google Music Manager - Docker Image (Multiarch)
This image allows you to download and upload your Google Music Library to/from a selected folder. This image is based on Google MusicManager (https://github.com/jaymoulin/google-music-manager)
Container.Description:
Google Music Manager - Docker Image (Multiarch)
This image allows you to download and upload your Google Music Library to/from a selected folder. This image is based on Google MusicManager (https://github.com/jaymoulin/google-music-manager)

Config.Name: REMOVE
Config.Description: Remove file on successful upload (boolean, (default: true)) - pass to false if you want to keep files

Config.Name: UPLOADER_ID
Config.Description: Identity of your uploader, must be your MAC address in uppercase (default: false, which means your actual MAC address) - Change this value only if you know what you are doing and had MAX_PER_MACHINE_USERS_EXCEEDED error
